nodes.text: A Human male lived on the planet Greater Marianas in the Outer Rim Territories. He was a yaggie man for forty years.

In 2001, this character appeared in the tenth issue of Dark Horse Comics's Star Wars Tales series, present in a story entitled "Trooper". Leland Chee, continuity referee of Lucasfilm, stated that elements of those Tales comics are considered S-canon until referenced by C-canon materials. He later confirmed on his Facebook page that this particular story was intended to be non-canon.
